body_html: Usually states are fed to tf.nn.rnn via initial_state parameter. you can use cell.zero_state method to get an all zeros initial state. Alternatively, you do not have to pass one and cell.zero_state will be called for you. You do not need to store an initial state to a Variable in most cases.
body_text: Usually states are fed to tf.nn.rnn via initial_state parameter.  you can use cell.zero_state method to get an all zeros initial state.  Alternatively, you do not have to pass one and cell.zero_state will be called for you.  You do not need to store an initial state to a Variable in most cases.
body: Usually states are fed to tf.nn.rnn via initial_state parameter.  you can use cell.zero_state method to get an all zeros initial state.  Alternatively, you do not have to pass one and cell.zero_state will be called for you.  You do not need to store an initial state to a Variable in most cases.
